rows.label: qev026901_MSG0001
rows.name: Hey, you there! Yoo-hoo! Yes, you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026901_MSG0002
rows.name:
You seem absolutely bored to death.
Why not spend a little...quality time with me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026901_JNK0010
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: qev026901_SEL0011
rows.name: Say you're covered in the...quality time department.

rows.label: qev026901_JNK0020
rows.name: Consider

rows.label: qev026901_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell Lara you ARE a fan of...quality time.

rows.label: qev026901_MSG0003
rows.name:
Covered? Oh, don't worry—I'm also taken care of in
the romance department.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026901_MSG0004
rows.name:
There's only so many reasons one BLADE strikes up a
conversation with another, am I right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026901_MSG0005
rows.name:
Or were you just teasing me? Or did maybe you get
all blushy because I was talking to you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026901_MSG0006
rows.name: Oh, I do like honesty...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026901_MSG0007
rows.name:
But unfortunately, I'm not propositioning you.
Not this time, anyway—but never say never![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026901_MSG0008
rows.name:
Those government mucky-mucks have given me a job.
And while I'm flattered to be asked for by name,
I could still use a little help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026901_MSG0009
rows.name:
You've probably already heard the rumors, but talk is
some team took down a huge beastie out in Sylvalum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026901_MSG0010
rows.name:
Well, the big lunk's body is still just sitting there,
so they want me to bring it in for research and
dissection and whatnot.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026901_MSG0011
rows.name: Which brings me to my itty-bitty little favor![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026901_MSG0012
rows.name:
And with that, I'll let my friend here explain the details.
They hired him to do all the analysis bits.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026901_MSG0013
rows.name:
Er, okay? You're a bit hard to live up to excitement-
wise, but I guess I'll try?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026901_MSG0014
rows.name:
Probably for the best that I'm boring though, right?
Since this next part is rather serious.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026901_MSG0015
rows.name: Augh, rude! I was TOTALLY serious![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026901_MSG0016
rows.name:
So the aforementioned "big lunk" was apparently a
massive Ganglion weapon, you see?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026901_MSG0017
rows.name:
We had previously dismissed them as a band of thugs,
but this is is is some fairly impressive tech.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026901_MSG0018
rows.name:
And the Ma-non aren't the type to let tasty morsels like
this go to waste, are we?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026901_MSG0019
rows.name:
So we've taken a proactive interest in in this case,
you understand?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026901_MSG0020
rows.name:
You make it sound so noble! You little hyenas just want
your turn picking the bones of the lion's kill.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026901_MSG0021
rows.name:
N-no! That's not not true. ...Also, what's a hyena?
Or a lion, for that matter?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026901_MSG0022
rows.name:
Our motives are half a tireless thirst for scientific
knowledge, and half a desire to waste nothing.
I think those are both noble, aren't they?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026901_MSG0023
rows.name:
It's a lovely pack of excuses.
But can we get on with this?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026901_MSG0024
rows.name:
Someone's liable to snatch up our treasure if we stand
around gabbing![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026901_MSG0025
rows.name: Er, I would if if you'd stop interrupting me, perhaps?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026901_MSG0026
rows.name: Anyway...moving along, all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026901_MSG0027
rows.name:
Initial reports suggest the engine and what we suspect
is is the cockpit remain largely unharmed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026901_MSG0028
rows.name:
But obviously, if other parts are also salvageable,
then so much the better, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026901_MSG0029
rows.name:
In other words, we just need you to go out there and
grab whatever you can, if if that's okay with you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026901_MSG0030
rows.name:
Anything that's completely ruined is safe to ignore.
I hope I can maybe just leave that judgment to you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026901_MSG0031
rows.name: Is that clear? Does it all make sense?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026901_MSG0032
rows.name: Good. Then please please hurry—er, if that's all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026901_MSG0033
rows.name:
Walking fast is good. But maybe running would be
even better?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026901_MSG0034
rows.name:
Oh, I know you won't disappoint me.
I'll be waaaiting![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026901_MSG0036
rows.name:
That cockpit block and engine are supposed to be in a
pretty rough neighborhood.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026901_MSG0037
rows.name:
It's going to be a rough job, but I'm sure you've seen
worse, eh, tiger?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026901_MSG0038
rows.name:
Now hustle off to Sylvalum and grab all the bits and
pieces of that big baddie you can carry.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026901_MSG0039
rows.name:
All done? Well, aren't you the busy little bee!
I knew you'd manage.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026901_MSG0040
rows.name:
The moment I saw you, I just knew. Intuition, call it.
"This kid's got what it takes," it said.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026901_MSG0041
rows.name:
Now why don't we hand those parts over to Rutantan
here and let him do his egghead thing.[ST:wait ]
